verses.verse: If there be therefore <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3874>consolation<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> if <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G3890>comfort<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> if <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> if <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3628>mercies,<s%>

Fulfill <S%G4137><s%> ye <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye be <S%G5426>likeminded,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> being of one <S%G4861>accord,<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5426>mind.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>nothing<s%> be done <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G2052>strife<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2754>vainglory;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> in lowliness of <S%G5012>mind<s%> let each esteem <S%G240>other<s%> <S%G2233><s%> <S%G5242>better<s%> than <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>
Look <S%G4648><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> on his own <S%G1438>things,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> on the things of <S%G2087>others.<s%>
<S%G1063><s%> Let this mind <S%G5426>be<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3444>form<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2233>thought<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G725>robbery<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2470>equal<s%> with God: <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> made himself of no <S%G2758>reputation,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> upon him the <S%G3444>form<s%> of a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> and was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of men: <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> being <S%G2147>found<s%> in <S%G4976>fashion<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> he <S%G5013>humbled<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> hath highly <S%G5251>exalted<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5483>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> name: <S%G3686><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> should <S%G2578>bow,<s%> of things in <S%G2032>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> things in <S%G1919>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> things under the <S%G2709>earth;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> should <S%G1843>confess<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G5620><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> ye have <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3952>presence<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G666>absence,<s%> work <S%G2716>out<s%> your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5156>trembling.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> which <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1754>do<s%> of <S%G5228>his<s%> good <S%G2107>pleasure.<s%>
Do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G1112>murmurings<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> disputings: <S%G1261><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> ye may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G273>blameless<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G185>harmless,<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> without <S%G298>rebuke,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of a <S%G4646>crooked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1294>perverse<s%> <S%G1074>nation,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G5316>shine<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5458>lights<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world;<s%>

Holding <S%G1907>forth<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1698>I<s%> may <S%G1519>rejoice<s%> <S%G2745><s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G2872>labored<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

Yea, <S%G235><s%> and <S%G1499>if<s%> I be <S%G4689>offered<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3009>service<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> I <S%G5463>joy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rejoice <S%G4796>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all.<s%>
<S%G1161><s%> For <S%G3588>the<s%> same <S%G846>cause<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> do <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G5463>joy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> rejoice <S%G4796>with<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1679>trust<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> I <S%G2504>also<s%> may be of good <S%G2174>comfort,<s%> when I <S%G1097>know<s%> your <S%G4012>state.<s%> <S%G5216><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2473>likeminded,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> will <S%G1104>naturally<s%> <S%G3309>care<s%> for your <S%G4012>state.<s%> <S%G5216><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> their <S%G1438>own,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which are <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5043>son<s%> with the <S%G3962>father,<s%> he hath <S%G1398>served<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>

Him <S%G5126><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1824>presently,<s%> so soon <S%G5613>as<s%> I shall <S%G542>see<s%> <S%G302><s%> how it will go <S%G4012>with<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3982>trust<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5030>shortly.<s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G2233>supposed<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1891>Epaphroditus,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> companion in <S%G4904>labor,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fellow <S%G4961>soldier,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G652>messenger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G3011>ministered<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5532>wants.<s%>

For <S%G1894><s%> he longed <S%G2258>after<s%> <S%G1971><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was full of <S%G85>heaviness,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> that ye had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had been <S%G770>sick.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532>indeed<s%> he was <S%G770>sick<s%> nigh <S%G3897>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> on <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>

I <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the more <S%G4708>carefully,<s%> <S%G2443>that,<s%> when ye <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> ye may <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> and that <S%G2504>I<s%> may <S%G5600>be<s%> the less <S%G253>sorrowful.<s%>

Receive <S%G4327><s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>gladness;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> in reputation: <S%G1784><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> he was <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> not <S%G3851>regarding<s%> his <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G378>supply<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5303>lack<s%> of <S%G3009>service<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>
